text: Ezɨ a uabɨ e gamizɨma, e Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir Igiar kam, e an ingangarir gumazibar otifi. Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir kam, a bizir me akɨnafarimɨn osirizir puvatɨzim, mati Moses Osirizir Arazir fomɨram otoziba. Puvatɨ. Kar Godɨn Duamɨn bizim. Moses Osirizir Araziba gumazibagh amima me ovei. Ezɨ Godɨn Duam ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim me ganɨdi.
